channel.title: Xian Xu
channel.description: The home page of Xian Xu, co-founder of Gruntwork, author of "Hello, Startup" and "Terraform: Up & Running", and software engineer at LinkedIn, TripAdvisor, Cisco Systems, and Thomson Financial.

item.title: 那些素不相识的reviwer
item.description: 这篇文章，初稿是完成VIS18 camera ready paper的时候写的。 结果一直拖拖拉拉，直到现在写好。

item.title: 2017-2018读书笔记：给我力量的三本书
item.description: 想记录一下2017-2018，在所有不开心的日子里，给我力量的三本书。

item.title: D3.js with React
item.description: D3.js is one of the best available options for data visualization. Since its creation in 2011, it has become the de facto for bulding data visualziations on the web. React, in my opionion, is obviously the best library. It’s simple, declarative, and composable.

item.title: Some Helpful Resources for Learning DNNs
item.description: I list some helpful resources for learning deep neural networks based on my learning experience. Will update from time to time.

item.title: My first blog
item.description: This is the first blog at my new personal homepage. Have fun!
